eu.wauz.wauzcore.items.util

Class EquipmentUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.wauz.wauzcore.items.util.EquipmentUtils

  • public class EquipmentUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    An util class for reading and writing equipment properties.
    Author:
    Wauzmons
    See Also:
    ItemUtils

        Returns:
        If the item has a rune socket.
